name: Rotator (itch) (SpacexBanana)
description:
Controls:

W,A,S,D - moves the Player

Left and right arrow keys - Rotates the map by 90 degrees

Up and down arrow keys - This is for the menu, keys move menu Cursor up and down

Enter - To select an option at the menu

Yes, there's a lot of bugs, most importantly a bug where the door will not let you progress to the next level when you have the key, to fix this move back and forth in front of the door and eventually it'll move to the next level. The game has no audio, don't really know how to add that. Plus, if you're still reading, this is my first finished game so I'm happy for that regardless.
